title: GOLD
lyrics:
Yeong-wonhi Stay GOLD and never let go
Geumbich-eulo muldeul-yeo neowa naui yagsogdeul
Eodum sog-eseo nuguboda nunbusige neon
Nae ma-eum-e hayan bich-eul sunoh-a
Eotteon geosdo dulyeobji anh-a Uh Oh



Stay GOLD jisang-eseo yeong-won-eulo

Machimnae Golden Era

Geu jangmisbich nundongja sog-e bichin

Ulideul-ui milaeleul bwass-eo nan

Naleul mid-eo I promise you

Yeoljeong-e gadeug cha issdeon neoui

Yeppeun ma-eum-e han beon deo deoschilhae Platinum



Yeong-wonhi Stay GOLD and never let go

Geumbich-eulo muldeul-yeo neowa naui salang-eul



Go Go GOLD jeo banjjagbanjjag geolineun

Go Go GOLD byeoldeulboda meolli

Go Go GOLD bichnal geoya

When the golden age begins



Neowa naega wonhaneun sigan

La vie en rose sog-e

Bamhaneul wie byeol-eun dan hanado

Pil-yohaji anh-a naegen Wuh Uh

Geu eonjenga ma-eumsog kkum-i

Da ilwojil ttaekkaji

Geuligo uli salm-i

Geumbich-eulo muldeul ttaekkaji



Al su iss-eo balg-eun ne misoleul bomyeon

Naneun kkaedal-a Right

Neon nae majimag salang-iya

Jeonghaejyeo issneun unmyeongcheoleom

Dolgo dol-a seolo ieojyeo

Gat-eun gos-eul geol-eo



Yeong-wonhi Stay GOLD and never let go

Geumbich-eulo muldeul-yeo neowa naui salang-eul



Go Go GOLD jeo banjjagbanjjag geolineun

Go Go GOLD byeoldeulboda meolli

Go Go GOLD bichnal geoya

When the golden age begins



Yeah geu nugulado tamnael geol

Mueosgwado bigyo an doelgeol

Naui insaeng-ui ju-ingong geuge

Balo neoin geol ij-ji mallago Yeah

Live your own life mandeul-eoga

Jeoldaelo nogseulji anh-a bichnaneun salm

I’m talkin’ to y’all

Maeil-i hwang-geumgiin geoscheoleom



Kamkamhan eodum sog-ilado

Oh Baby byeoljalil ttalagadeus Oh

Bich-i nal annaehaejwo Yeah

Imi nan algo iss-eo

Seonmyeonghi boineun geos gat-a

Neowa nanun bimilcheoleom

Byeonchi anhneun geosdeul mal-iya

Stay in GOLD



Yeong-wonhi Stay GOLD

Stay GOLD GOLD GOLD

And never let go

Yeah Yeah Yeah

Oh Every day I see beautiful smile

Bukkeuleom eobsneun nanal Baby Baby Baby



Eonjena Stay GOLD

GOLD GOLD GOLD GOLD GOLD

And never let go

Jigeum i nolaecheoleom

I nolaecheoleom

Yeong-won-eul nan yagsoghae

Yagsoghalge



Go Go GOLD Oh Yeah

Go Go GOLD Stay GOLD my baby

Go Go GOLDbichnal geoya

Everyday is golden age
